title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/18/19
itunes:title: Protecting the Power Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 6/18/19
description:
George Noory and Dr. William Forstchen discuss his efforts to protect the country's power grid, which is vulnerable to attack from foreign nations or solar flares, and the disasters that would occur if the grid ever went down.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
